title: COVID19 Summary Info (NI)
description:
DoH COVID-19 interactive statistics dashboard, displays information on:
COVID-19 test results by LGD
Positive test results by Gender
Cumulative positive tests by date
Number of COVID-19 deaths[1]
COVID-19 deaths by gender
COVID-19 deaths by age group
Cumulative deaths by date
Hospital beds available
Hospital beds occupied
ICU beds available and occupied, including the number occupied by COVID-19 patients
Number of COVID-19 hospital discharges
Patients in hospital broken down by age group
Cumulative numbers of patient admissions and discharges for COVID-19
datasetNotes: Power BI buttons on landing page.
sizingNotes: Messy Power BI tables with integrated text and graphs. Source data no doubt comes from other datasets which have yet to be ascertained.
